trans-unit.source: Represents a synchronization primitive that is signaled when its count reaches zero.
trans-unit.target: 수가 0에 도달하는 경우 신호를 받는 동기화 기본 형식을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: All public and protected members of <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads, with the exception of Dispose, which must only be used when all other operations on the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> have completed, and Reset, which should only be used when no other threads are accessing the event.
trans-unit.target: 모든 공용 및 보호 된 구성원 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> 는 스레드로부터 안전 하며에서 해야 하는 Dispose 제외 하 고 여러 스레드에서 동시에 사용할 수 있습니다 때 사용의 다른 모든 작업이 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> 를 완료 하 고 다시 설정를 하는 다른 스레드가 없는 이벤트에 액세스 하는 때만 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Example
The following example shows how to use a <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />:
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />:

trans-unit.source: The number of signals initially required to set the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />를 설정하는 데 처음 필요한 신호의 수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> class with the specified count.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 수를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: iI `initialCount` is 0, the event is created in a signaled state.
trans-unit.target: iI `initialCount` 가 0 이면 이벤트 신호를 받은 상태로 만들어집니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="initialCount" /> is less than 0.
Increments the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />'s current count.
Increments the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />'s current count by one.
The current instance has already been disposed.
The current instance is already set.
-or-
<see cref="P:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.CurrentCount" /> is equal to or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
The value by which to increase <see cref="P:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.CurrentCount" />.
Increments the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />'s current count by a specified value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />의 현재 수를 지정된 값만큼 늘립니다.

trans-unit.source: The current instance has already been disposed.
<paramref name="signalCount" /> is less than or equal to 0.
The current instance is already set.
-or-
<see cref="P:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.CurrentCount" /> is equal to or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> after count is incremented by <paramref name="signalCount." />
trans-unit.target: 개수가 <paramref name="signalCount." /> 만큼 증가된 후에 <see cref="P:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.CurrentCount" />가 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />보다 크거나 같은 경우

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of remaining signals required to set the event.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 설정하는 데 필요한 남아 있는 신호의 수를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of remaining signals required to set the event.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 설정하는 데 필요한 남아 있는 신호의 수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Releases resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> 클래스의 현재 인스턴스에서 사용하는 리소스를 해제합니다.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> 클래스의 현재 인스턴스에서 사용하는 모든 리소스를 해제합니다.

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent>.
The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 메서드를 사용하면 <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent>를 사용할 수 없게 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 호출한 후 `Dispose`에 대 한 모든 참조를 해제 해야는 <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent> 가비지 수집기는 메모리를 회수할 수 있도록 하는 <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent> 차지한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [관리 되지 않는 리소스 정리](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 및 [Dispose 메서드를 구현](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent>.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`에 대한 마지막 참조를 해제하기 전에 반드시 <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent>를 호출하십시오.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 이렇게 하지 않으면 가비지 수집기가 <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent> 개체의 `Finalize` 메서드를 호출할 때까지 사용 중인 리소스가 해제되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 관리되는 리소스와 관리되지 않는 리소스를 모두 해제하려면 true이고, 관리되지 않는 리소스만 해제하려면 false입니다.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />, and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />에서 사용하는 관리되지 않는 리소스를 해제하고, 관리되는 리소스를 선택적으로 해제할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Unlike most of the members of <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent>, <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.Dispose%2A> is not thread-safe and may not be used concurrently with other members of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 대부분의 멤버의 달리 <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent>, <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.Dispose%2A> 스레드로부터 안전 하지 않은 하 고이 인스턴스의 다른 멤버와 동시에 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the numbers of signals initially required to set the event.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 설정하는 데 처음으로 필요한 신호의 수를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of signals initially required to set the event.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 설정하는 데 처음으로 필요한 신호의 수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> object's current count has reached zero..
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> 개체의 현재 개수가 0에 도달했는지 여부를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current count is zero; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 현재 횟수가 0; 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent> does not raise an event when the countdown has reached zero.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent> 카운트다운이 0에 도달 했을 때 이벤트를 발생 시 키 지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.CurrentCount%2A> property equals zero, and the <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.IsSet%2A> property equals `true`.
Resets the <see cref="P:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.CurrentCount" /> value.
Resets the <see cref="P:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.CurrentCount" /> to the value of <see cref="P:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.InitialCount" />.
Unlike most of the members of <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent>, Reset is not thread-safe and may not be used concurrently with other members of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 대부분의 멤버의 달리 <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent>, 재설정 스레드로부터 안전 하지 않은 하 고이 인스턴스의 다른 멤버와 동시에 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The current instance has already been disposed..
The number of signals required to set the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />를 설정하는 데 필요한 신호의 수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Resets the <see cref="P:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.InitialCount" /> property to a specified value.
This method resets <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.InitialCount%2A> for all subsequent accesses of the property on the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 다시 설정 <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.InitialCount%2A> 현재 인스턴스에 대 한 속성의 모든 후속 액세스에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Unlike most of the members of <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent>, Reset is not thread-safe and may not be used concurrently with other members of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 대부분의 멤버의 달리 <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent>, 재설정 스레드로부터 안전 하지 않은 하 고이 인스턴스의 다른 멤버와 동시에 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The current instance has alread been disposed.
<paramref name="count" /> is less than 0.
Registers a signal with the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />, decrementing the value of <see cref="P:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.CurrentCount" />.
Registers a signal with the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />, decrementing the value of <see cref="P:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.CurrentCount" />.
true if the signal caused the count to reach zero and the event was set; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: 신호로 인해 수가 0에 도달하고 이벤트가 설정되었으면 true이고, 그렇지 않으면 false입니다.

trans-unit.source: The current instance has already been disposed.
The current instance is already set.
The number of signals to register.
Registers multiple signals with the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />, decrementing the value of <see cref="P:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.CurrentCount" /> by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 양만큼 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> 값을 줄이면서 여러 신호를 <see cref="P:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.CurrentCount" />에 등록합니다.

trans-unit.source: true if the signals caused the count to reach zero and the event was set; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: 신호로 인해 수가 0에 도달하고 이벤트가 설정되었으면 true이고, 그렇지 않으면 false입니다.

trans-unit.source: The current instance has already been disposed.
<paramref name="signalCount" /> is less than 1.
The current instance is already set.
-or- Or <paramref name="signalCount" /> is greater than <see cref="P:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.CurrentCount" />.
Attempts to increment <see cref="P:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.CurrentCount" />.
Attempts to increment <see cref="P:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.CurrentCount" /> by one.
true if the increment succeeded; otherwise, false.
If <see cref="P:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.CurrentCount" /> is already at zero, this method will return false.
The current instance has already been disposed.
<see cref="P:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.CurrentCount" /> is equal to <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
The value by which to increase <see cref="P:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.CurrentCount" />.
Attempts to increment <see cref="P:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.CurrentCount" /> by a specified value.
true if the increment succeeded; otherwise, false.
If <see cref="P:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.CurrentCount" /> is already at zero this will return false.
The current instance has already been disposed.
<paramref name="signalCount" /> is less than or equal to 0.
The current instance is already set.
-or-
<see cref="P:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.CurrentCount" /> + <paramref name="signalCount" /> is equal to or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
Blocks the current thread until the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> is set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />가 설정될 때까지 현재 스레드를 차단합니다.

trans-unit.source: Blocks the current thread until the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> is set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />가 설정될 때까지 현재 스레드를 차단합니다.

trans-unit.source: The caller of this method blocks indefinitely until the current instance is set.
trans-unit.target: 현재 인스턴스가 설정 되어 있을 때까지 무한정이 메서드 블록의 호출자입니다.

trans-unit.source: The caller will return immediately if the event is currently in a set state.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트가 아직 설정 상태 호출자에 게 즉시 반환 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The current instance has already been disposed.
The number of milliseconds to wait, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" />(-1) to wait indefinitely.
Blocks the current thread until the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> is set, using a 32-bit signed integer to measure the timeout.
trans-unit.target: 부호 있는 32비트 정수로 시간 제한을 측정하여 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />가 설정될 때까지 현재 스레드를 차단합니다.

trans-unit.source: true if the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> was set; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />이 설정되었으면 true이고, 그렇지 않으면 false입니다.

trans-unit.source: The current instance has already been disposed.
<paramref name="millisecondsTimeout" /> is a negative number other than -1, which represents an infinite time-out.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="millisecondsTimeout" />이 시간 제한 없음을 나타내는 -1 이외의 음수인 경우

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> to observe.
Blocks the current thread until the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> is set, while observing a <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />을 확인하면서 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />가 설정될 때까지 현재 스레드를 차단합니다.

trans-unit.source: The caller of this method blocks indefinitely until the current instance is set.
trans-unit.target: 현재 인스턴스가 설정 되어 있을 때까지 무한정이 메서드 블록의 호출자입니다.

trans-unit.source: The caller will return immediately if the event is currently in a set state.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트가 아직 설정 상태 호출자에 게 즉시 반환 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken> being observed is canceled during the wait operation, an <xref:System.OperationCanceledException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken> 대기 작업 중에 취소는 관찰 되는 <xref:System.OperationCanceledException> throw 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> has been canceled.
The current instance has already been disposed.
-or- The <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource" /> that created <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> has already been disposed.
A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that represents the number of milliseconds to wait, or a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that represents -1 milliseconds to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 대기할 시간(밀리초)을 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />이거나, 무한 대기하도록 -1밀리초를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Blocks the current thread until the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> is set, using a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> to measure the timeout.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />으로 시간 제한을 측정하여 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />가 설정될 때까지 현재 스레드를 차단합니다.

trans-unit.source: true if the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> was set; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />이 설정되었으면 true이고, 그렇지 않으면 false입니다.

trans-unit.source: The current instance has already been disposed.
<paramref name="timeout" /> is a negative number other than -1 milliseconds, which represents an infinite time-out -or- timeout is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="timeout" />이 무기한 시간 제한을 나타내는 -1밀리초 이외의 음수이거나 시간 제한이 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />보다 큰 경우.

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" />(-1) to wait indefinitely.
The <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> to observe.

Blocks the current thread until the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> is set, using a 32-bit signed integer to measure the timeout, while observing a <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />을 확인하면서 부호 있는 32비트 정수로 시간 제한을 측정하여 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />가 설정될 때까지 현재 스레드를 차단합니다.

trans-unit.source: true if the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> was set; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />이 설정되었으면 true이고, 그렇지 않으면 false입니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> has been canceled.
The current instance has already been disposed.
-or- The <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource" /> that created <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> has already been disposed.
<paramref name="millisecondsTimeout" /> is a negative number other than -1, which represents an infinite time-out.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="millisecondsTimeout" />이 시간 제한 없음을 나타내는 -1 이외의 음수인 경우

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that represents the number of milliseconds to wait, or a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that represents -1 milliseconds to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 대기할 시간(밀리초)을 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />이거나, 무한 대기하도록 -1밀리초를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> to observe.

Blocks the current thread until the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> is set, using a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> to measure the timeout, while observing a <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />을 확인하면서 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />으로 시간 제한을 측정하여 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />가 설정될 때까지 현재 스레드를 차단합니다.

trans-unit.source: true if the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" /> was set; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.CountdownEvent" />이 설정되었으면 true이고, 그렇지 않으면 false입니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> has been canceled.
The current instance has already been disposed.
-or- The <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource" /> that created <paramref name="cancellationToken" /> has already been disposed.
<paramref name="timeout" /> is a negative number other than -1 milliseconds, which represents an infinite time-out -or- timeout is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="timeout" />이 무기한 시간 제한을 나타내는 -1밀리초 이외의 음수이거나 시간 제한이 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />보다 큰 경우.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> that is used to wait for the event to be set.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트가 설정될 때까지 대기하는 데 사용되는 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" />을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> that is used to wait for the event to be set.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트가 설정될 때까지 대기하는 데 사용되는 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.WaitHandle%2A> should only be used if it's needed for integration with code bases that rely on having a WaitHandle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.WaitHandle%2A> WaitHandle 여부에 의존 하는 코드 베이스와의 통합에 필요한 경우에 사용 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If all that's needed is to wait for the <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent> to be set, the <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.Wait%2A> method should be preferred.
trans-unit.target: 모든 경우에 필요한 때까지 대기 하는 <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent> 을 설정 하려면는 <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent.Wait%2A> 메서드는 것이 좋습니다.

trans-unit.source: The current instance has already been disposed.
